column4: Anyone seen the error "vmware-player, action "start" failed." ?
Yes it is a bug that they have left unfixed for months and the maintainer should be shot because you will also notice that you can't remove it with apt-get
It is a bug in Ubuntu's packaging of vmware-player there is a bug report on it that has a solution for getting the package to uninstall in the comments
right, i'll look up the bug report
